department.ch: 產業經濟研究所碩士班

remark.ch: 經組必修，法組必選修，請自行選課。

goal.en: "本課程的目標是結合產業理論與實證模型, 以使學生學習如何利用實證分析來驗證相關的理論與產業現象."
goal.ch: 本課程的目標是結合產業理論與實證模型，以使學生學習如何利用實證分析來驗證相關的理論與產業現象。

content.en:
Topics
1. 2/15: Market Structure and Market Power
2. 2/22: Entry and Exit
3. 3/01: Structure-Conduct-Performance (SCP) Paradigm
4. 3/08: New Empirical Industrial Organization (NEIO)
5. 3/15: Price Discrimination
6. 3/22: Vertical Relations and Constraints
7. 3/29: Horizontal Mergers
8. 4/05: 放假 (民族掃墓節)
9. 4/12: 期中考
10. 4/19: Strategic Incumbents and Entry Strategies
11. 4/26: R&D, Innovation and Patent Licensing
12. 5/03: Advertising
13. 5/10: Product Differentiation/Product Variety
14. 5/17: 產經實證文獻分組口頭報告(1) ─ 指定文章
15. 5/24: 產經實證文獻分組口頭報告(2) ─ 指定文章
16. 5/31: 期末考
17. 6/07: 彈性教學 (個人期末報告主題討論─以台灣產業為研究對象：視訊/電郵)
18. 6/14: 彈性教學 (個人期末報告內容討論─以台灣產業為研究對象：視訊/電郵)

textbook.en: "Required Textbooks: Pepall, Lynne, Dan Richards and George Norman (2008), Industrial Organization: Contemporary Theory and Empirical Applications, fourth edition, Blackwell Publishing Ltd. Tremblay, Victor J. and Carol Horton Tremblay (2012), New Perspectives in Industrial Organization: with Contributions from Behavioral Economics and Game Theory, Springer, New York. Supplementary Readings: Carlton, Dennis and Jeffrey Perloff (2005), Modern Industrial Organization, fourth edition, Pearson-Addison Wesley. Waldman, Don E. and Elizabeth J. Jensen (2007), Industrial Organization: Theory and Practice, third edition, Pearson-Addison Wesley."
textbook.ch: "Required Textbooks: Pepall, Lynne, Dan Richards and George Norman (2008), Industrial Organization: Contemporary Theory and Empirical Applications, fourth edition, Blackwell Publishing Ltd. Tremblay, Victor J. and Carol Horton Tremblay (2012), New Perspectives in Industrial Organization: with Contributions from Behavioral Economics and Game Theory, Springer, New York. Supplementary Readings: Carlton, Dennis and Jeffrey Perloff (2005), Modern Industrial Organization, fourth edition, Pearson-Addison Wesley. Waldman, Don E. and Elizabeth J. Jensen (2007), Industrial Organization: Theory and Practice, third edition, Pearson-Addison Wesley."

method.ch: 講授 研討 其他

grading.en: Course Requirement: 1. Midterm Exam (30%) 2. Final Exam (30%) 3. Oral Presentation (15%) 4. Term report (20%) 5. Participation (5%)
grading.ch: Course Requirement: 1. Midterm Exam (30%) 2. Final Exam (30%) 3. Oral Presentation (15%) 4. Term report (20%) 5. Participation (5%)

en: Type:Master's Program、Doctoral Program only.Faculty:College of Management only.Department:Master of Industrial Economics only.Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementIE6001 only.
ch: 學制:限碩士班、博士班。學院:限管理學院。系所:限產業經濟研究所碩士班。指定課程:必須先修IE6001。
